abstract: Kathryn Bentley, the Los Angeles-based designer, fittingly selects a book that documents the motifs of traditional Navajo weaving.
snippet: Kathryn Bentley, the Los Angeles-based designer, fittingly selects a book that documents the motifs of traditional Navajo weaving.
lead_paragraph: Off the Shelf is a regular column that spotlights the books that inspire great talents, designers and entrepreneurs.
